Summary: spotted ufo approx. 100 ft. from four lane hwy. in cemetary. had lights flashing around rim of craft.
divs: Sighting Detailsafter having worked overtime, i headed down 79th st, a four lane highway eastbound in justice, illinois at 88th avenue. i stopped at stop light and noticed a round, silver metallic vehicle which was sitting in a cemetary (bethania or ressurection, not sure of name). it appeared to be approzimately 25 feet or so in diameter and about 7 feet tall. it had a middle section which was flat and raised and had probably a dozen white lights about 1 ft. in diameter which appeared to be pulsing constantly. as there were no other vehicles on the road which i noticed at the time, i was alarmed by what i saw and didn't stop again when the street light turned green. i left the scene and continued another few miles to my residence in burbank, il. i did pay attention the next day when i went to work and saw that the grassy area where i saw the vehicle parked appeared to have a black, oily or charred appearance as if the area was burned up. the shape of the area was definitely round and for at least another dozen years the grass never changed appearance which has led me to think that the area must have been chemically altered in some fashion. i always look at the spot whenever i happen to be in the area and since the event, i believe it has been paved. i will always be sorry because i never attempted to call the cemetary's management to relate these details to them. i would like to say that in this small area of the cemetary, i have never seen any gravesites as it is in the northeast corner of the highway. i also need to elaborate on the fact that the vehicle was within 100 feet of me so i could see it very plainly even though it was about 3 am and fairly dimly lit. my belief has always been that it was probably in that exact spot because of possible examination of recently deceased humans.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Justice
This sighting has never been favorited.
